The drama series focuses on the mission of a criminologist and a former police officer to find a missing girl in […] The post Netflix Schedule April 14 – April 20 2025: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.

excerpt: Wondering what is the Netflix schedule from April 14 to April 20, 2025? Here is a list of all the movies and TV shows being added.

text: Netflix’s new TV and movie releases for April 14-20, 2025, include The Glass Dome, Young Sheldon Season 7, Baby Mama, Ransom Canyon, and many more. On April 15, The Glass Dome drops on Netflix. The drama series focuses on the mission of a criminologist and a former police officer to find a missing girl in a small town. However, the investigation takes unexpected turns as mysteries unravel. Further, Young Sheldon Season 7 will be available on the streaming platform this week. It resumes the journey of the brilliant young child, Sheldon Cooper. While the kid is extraordinary when it comes to academics, he lacks social skills. Nevertheless, Sheldon keeps surprising everyone with his intelligence. Also coming out on Netflix is the romantic-comedy Baby Mama. It revolves around Kate Holbrook, who hires a working-class woman as a surrogate for her child after finding out about her infertility. However, things go upside down when the woman demands a place to live. This leads to a series of hilarious adventures as Kate and the surrogate try living together peacefully. Additionally, Ransom Canyon will be available on the streaming platform on April 17. The romantic western drama series is loosely based on Jodi Thomas’ books. It follows the adventures of the people at Ramson Canyon as they fight for their land. New Netflix releases for April 14 – April 20, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Netflix from April 14 – April 20, 2025 April 15 The Glass Dome Young Sheldon Season 7 April 16 Baby Mama The Diamond Heist Project UFO I Am Not Mendoza April 17 Ransom Canyon Istanbul Encyclopedia April 18 iHostage Oklahoma City Bombing: American Terror April 19 Heavenly Ever After For more Netflix content, check out an update on Adolescence Season 2. Also, here is who won Million Dollar Secret.
html:
Netflix’s new TV and movie releases for April 14-20, 2025, include The Glass Dome, Young Sheldon Season 7, Baby Mama, Ransom Canyon, and many more.

On April 15, The Glass Dome drops on Netflix. The drama series focuses on the mission of a criminologist and a former police officer to find a missing girl in a small town. However, the investigation takes unexpected turns as mysteries unravel.

Further, Young Sheldon Season 7 will be available on the streaming platform this week. It resumes the journey of the brilliant young child, Sheldon Cooper. While the kid is extraordinary when it comes to academics, he lacks social skills. Nevertheless, Sheldon keeps surprising everyone with his intelligence.

Also coming out on Netflix is the romantic-comedy Baby Mama. It revolves around Kate Holbrook, who hires a working-class woman as a surrogate for her child after finding out about her infertility. However, things go upside down when the woman demands a place to live. This leads to a series of hilarious adventures as Kate and the surrogate try living together peacefully.

Additionally, Ransom Canyon will be available on the streaming platform on April 17. The romantic western drama series is loosely based on Jodi Thomas’ books. It follows the adventures of the people at Ramson Canyon as they fight for their land.

New Netflix releases for April 14 – April 20, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Netflix from April 14 – April 20, 2025

April 15

  • The Glass Dome
  • Young Sheldon Season 7

April 16

  • Baby Mama
  • The Diamond Heist
  • Project UFO
  • I Am Not Mendoza

April 17

  • Ransom Canyon
  • Istanbul Encyclopedia

April 18

  • iHostage
  • Oklahoma City Bombing: American Terror

April 19

  • Heavenly Ever After

For more Netflix content, check out an update on Adolescence Season 2. Also, here is who won Million Dollar Secret.
